
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53266138">
<font size="4"><div align="left">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;马丁老师是中科院的物理博士，有着14年的物理教龄，知识点讲解得比较细致，初中物理跟着马丁老师学准没错，中考物理复习专题也有。他</div>不仅停留在讲题，还有很多方法论；怎样才能学好初中物理；有哪些学习上的好习惯要保持，坏习惯是要摒弃的，都有涉及到，自我介绍“<font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Helvetica Neue, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Microsoft YaHei UI, Microsoft YaHei, Arial, sans-serif"><font color="#3f3f3f">远离虚假勤奋，拒绝投机取巧</font></font>”，就是为了能够帮助同学们在学习物理时打下扎实的基础。<br>
</font><font size="4"><img id="aimg_c9S9e" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://66img.cc/i/2025/06/17/685151134571d.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://66img.cc/i/2025/06/17/685151134571d.jpg"><img id="aimg_TVwmQ" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://66img.cc/i/2025/06/17/685151149d986.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://66img.cc/i/2025/06/17/685151149d986.jpg">百度链接: <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/16uAOuKZG0pRdGw4kvN5Vyw?pwd=j27p" target="_blank">https://pan.baidu.com/s/16uAOuKZG0pRdGw4kvN5Vyw?pwd=j27p</a> 提取码: j27p 夸克链接：https://pan.quark.cn/s/1cdcd662339c</font><font style="color:rgb(63, 63, 63)"><font style="font-size:16px"><br>
